Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameManager
public class Game extends Object implements GameManager
Game contains all manager of the model. It is the connection point between the other classes of this package. Also, it is the class that is exposed to the controller. In this class are setting listeners of all other class.
